test_videos.description: Travel vlog - quick highlights from a trip

frame_level_data.description: Opening shot: Person standing at airport terminal, luggage in hand, excited expression, natural lighting
Transition: Plane taking off, dramatic sky view, golden hour lighting
Destination arrival: Person walking through vibrant street market, colorful stalls, people in background
Food moment: Close-up of delicious local dish being prepared, steam rising, appetizing presentation
Scenic view: Beautiful sunset over mountains, person in silhouette, cinematic composition
Action moment: Person trying local activity (surfing/dancing), dynamic movement, engaging
Cultural moment: Local festival or celebration, vibrant colors, people dancing, energetic
Personal moment: Person laughing with locals, authentic interaction, warm atmosphere
Landmark: Famous building or monument, person taking photo, tourist moment
Nature shot: Beautiful beach or landscape, person enjoying view, peaceful
Food again: Person eating at local restaurant, satisfied expression, social setting
Night scene: City lights, person walking, urban atmosphere, modern
Adventure: Person doing something adventurous (hiking/climbing), action-packed
Reflection: Person looking at view, contemplative, emotional moment
Group moment: Person with friends or locals, group photo, happy
Final destination: Another beautiful location, person exploring, discovery
Sunset: Final sunset shot, person in frame, emotional ending
Closing: Person waving goodbye or looking at camera, personal connection
End card: Text overlay or final shot, call to action moment

scenes.description: Opening and travel - Airport to destination arrival, establishing the journey
Food and culture - Local food experience and cultural immersion
Adventure and landmarks - Exploring and doing activities
Emotional moments - Reflection and connection with place
Closing - Final moments and call to action

transcript_data.text: Just landed in this amazing place and I'm so excited to show you what we're going to do today!
First stop, we're hitting up the local market. Look at all these colors!
And this food? Absolutely incredible. You have to try this if you ever come here.
We're about to do something I've never done before. This is going to be epic!
The people here are so welcoming. This experience is changing me.
Check out this view. I mean, come on. This is why we travel.
Having the best time with these amazing people. Travel brings us together.
This place has my heart. I don't want this trip to end.
If you're watching this, you need to add this to your bucket list. Trust me.
Thanks for coming on this journey with me. Don't forget to like and subscribe!

test_scenarios.name: high_energy_hype_reel

story_prompt.key_message: Show the most exciting moments, fast-paced, hype energy

story_arc.hook: Grab attention with most exciting moment in first 2 seconds
story_arc.build: Rapid fire of best moments, high energy

test_scenarios.expected_quality: Fast cuts, high energy, highlights only

test_scenarios.name: nostalgic_summer_vibes

story_prompt.key_message: End of summer, warm memories, emotional connection

story_arc.hook: Beautiful opening shot that sets the mood

test_scenarios.expected_quality: Smooth transitions, emotional beats, preserves mood

story_prompt.key_message: Quick tips for traveling, actionable advice

story_arc.hook: Start with result or preview of what you'll learn
story_arc.climax: Best tip or most important advice

frame_level_data.description: Hook: Product box in center, hands opening it, anticipation building
Unboxing: Removing product from box, clean presentation
First look: Product close-up, showing design details, professional lighting
Features: Demonstrating key feature, hands interacting with product
Comparison: Showing product next to competitor or old version
In use: Person using product in real scenario, authentic
Detail shot: Close-up of specific feature, highlighting quality
Problem solved: Showing how product solves a problem
Reaction: Person's genuine reaction, positive expression
Value prop: Showing why it's worth it, key benefit
Final thoughts: Person summarizing, honest opinion
Call to action: Product link or where to buy, clear CTA

scenes.description: Unboxing and first impressions - Opening and initial reaction
Features and demonstration - Showing what it does
Review and opinion - Honest thoughts and evaluation
Conclusion and CTA - Final verdict and call to action

transcript_data.text: Okay, I just got this in the mail and I'm so excited to unbox it for you guys!
First impressions? The packaging is actually really nice. Let's see what's inside.
So the main feature everyone's talking about is this right here. Watch this.
Compared to the old version, this is a huge upgrade. The difference is night and day.
I've been using it for a week now and honestly? It's changed how I do things.
The only downside is the price, but for what you get, it's worth it.
Overall, I'd give this a solid 8 out of 10. Would I recommend it? Yes.
Link in bio if you want to check it out. Let me know what you think in the comments!

test_scenarios.name: quick_review_short

story_prompt.key_message: Quick honest review, key features, worth it or not

story_arc.hook: Product reveal or key feature in first 2 seconds

test_scenarios.expected_quality: Clear features, honest opinion, quick but informative

test_videos.description: Day in the life - influencer morning routine

frame_level_data.description: Wake up: Alarm going off, person waking up, natural morning light
Coffee: Making coffee, aesthetic setup, cozy vibes
Skincare: Morning skincare routine, products shown, self-care moment
Outfit: Choosing outfit, fashion moment, style showcase
Breakfast: Healthy breakfast prep, aesthetic food, lifestyle
Work: Person at desk, productive moment, modern setup
Exercise: Quick workout or yoga, active lifestyle
Outdoor: Person outside, fresh air, nature connection
Social: Person meeting friend or content creation, social moment
Evening: Wind down, relaxing, cozy evening vibes
Reflection: Person journaling or reflecting, personal growth
Final: Person looking at camera, personal message, connection

scenes.description: Morning routine - Wake up, coffee, skincare, starting the day
Active day - Work, exercise, being productive
Social and personal - Connecting with others and self-care
Evening and reflection - Winding down, personal growth

transcript_data.text: Good morning! Let me show you my morning routine.
First things first, coffee. Can't function without it.
Skincare is so important. Taking care of yourself matters.
Today I'm going for a casual but put-together look.
Quick breakfast and then I'm ready to tackle the day.
Got some work done, now time for a quick workout.
Meeting up with a friend. Social connections are everything.
Evening is for winding down and reflecting on the day.
That's a day in my life. Thanks for watching, see you tomorrow!

test_scenarios.name: aesthetic_lifestyle

story_prompt.key_message: Show beautiful moments, aesthetic lifestyle, aspirational

test_scenarios.expected_quality: Aesthetic shots, smooth flow, lifestyle vibes

frame_level_data.description: Hook: Final dish plated beautifully, appetizing, makes you want to cook
Ingredients: All ingredients laid out, organized, clean presentation
Step 1: First cooking step, clear action, easy to follow
Step 2: Next step, hands doing action, instructional
Step 3: Cooking process, sizzling, appetizing visuals
Step 4: Adding ingredients, mixing, technique shown
Step 5: Final cooking, almost done, anticipation
Result: Final dish, beautiful plating, satisfying
Taste: Person tasting, positive reaction, endorsement
Tips: Quick tip or variation, helpful addition
CTA: Recipe link or follow for more, clear call to action

scenes.description: Setup and steps 1-2 - Ingredients and initial preparation
Cooking process - Steps 3-5, main cooking
Result and wrap-up - Final dish, taste, tips, CTA

transcript_data.text: Today I'm showing you how to make this amazing dish in just 5 minutes!
First, gather all your ingredients. You'll need these five things.
Step one, heat up your pan. Medium heat is perfect.
Add your first ingredient and let it cook for about two minutes.
Now add the rest and mix everything together. Smell that? Amazing.
Give it another minute and you're done. Look at that!
Quick tip: Add a little extra seasoning if you like it spicy.
That's it! Recipe in the description. Let me know if you try it!

test_scenarios.name: quick_tutorial_fast

story_prompt.key_message: Quick easy recipe, clear steps, anyone can do it

story_arc.hook: Show final result in first 2 seconds - makes you want to cook
story_arc.climax: Final dish reveal or best tip

test_scenarios.expected_quality: All steps included, clear flow, quick but complete

frame_level_data.description: Hook: Person showing results or doing impressive move, attention-grabbing
Warm-up: Person warming up, dynamic movement, energetic
Exercise 1: First exercise, good form, clear demonstration
Exercise 2: Second exercise, different angle, variety
Exercise 3: Third exercise, challenging move, impressive
Motivation: Person pushing through, determination, inspiring
Exercise 4: Fourth exercise, full body, comprehensive
Form check: Close-up showing proper form, educational
Cool down: Person cooling down, recovery, balanced
Results: Person showing progress or feeling good, positive
Encouragement: Person speaking to camera, motivational message
CTA: Follow for more workouts, subscribe, engagement

scenes.description: Hook and warm-up - Attention grabber and preparation
Main exercises - Core workout, exercises 1-4
Cool down and motivation - Recovery and inspiration
Wrap-up and CTA - Final message and call to action

transcript_data.text: You want to get fit in just 10 minutes? Let's do this workout together!
First, let's warm up. Get your body ready for what's coming.
Exercise one, squats. Keep your form tight, feel that burn.
Exercise two, push-ups. Push through, you've got this.
Exercise three, this one's tough but so worth it. Keep going!
Exercise four, full body movement. This is where the magic happens.
Great job! Now let's cool down and stretch it out.
How do you feel? Stronger? More energized? That's the goal.
Do this three times a week and you'll see results. I promise.
Follow for more workouts. Let's get fit together!

story_prompt.key_message: Quick effective workout, get fit fast, stay motivated

story_arc.hook: Show results or impressive move in first 2 seconds

test_scenarios.expected_quality: All exercises included, high energy, motivating
